title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - TravelConcierge
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the TravelConcierge project, including: 1. Detailed customer service workflows across all channels (email, chat, phone, social media). 2. Integrations with relevant systems (CRM, booking platforms, etc.). 3. Personalization features and user preferences management. 4. Data models and schema design considering data privacy and security. 5. Performance requirements to ensure smooth operation during peak usage periods. 6. A clear roadmap for each feature development and milestones. 7. Documentation of security considerations, including authentication, authorization, and encryption methods.

title: Design System Architecture (Revised) - Review and Feedback
description: Revise the system architecture design, including components, data flows, and integrations with existing systems. Factors such as scalability, performance, security, and maintainability should be considered. Provide a high-level overview as well as detailed component diagrams and data flow diagrams. Ensure compatibility and cohesion with other project aspects by adhering to the TravelConcierge style guide and documentation standards. Collaborate with team members during this process to facilitate seamless integration of your solution. Incorporate feedback from the 'Define Project Scope and Requirements' task, address any gaps in the initial design, and provide specific suggestions for improvement where necessary.

title: Design User Interface for TravelConcierge
description: Design the user interface for customer service agents, considering usability, accessibility, branding guidelines, and integration with backend systems. Ensure that the design aligns with our principles of delivering personalized service across all channels throughout the customer journey in the travel and hospitality industry. Incorporate responsive design for cross-device compatibility and focus on maintaining a consistent and intuitive user experience.

title: Design Data Storage and Management Strategy for TravelConcierge
description: Design the data storage and management strategy, focusing on customer data, service logs, personalization profiles. Ensure scalability, data security, privacy, compliance with industry standards, and data retention policies. Incorporate feedback from relevant stakeholders during the design process. Preferably, employ a modular and flexible approach for easy integration with other systems.

title: Define Security and Compliance Requirements for TravelConcierge
description: Clearly define, document, and prioritize security and compliance requirements, including data privacy, access controls, industry regulations (e.g., PCI-DSS, GDPR), specific requirements for the travel and hospitality industry, and alignment with best practices in the field. Ensure comprehensive coverage by exploring potential security threats, vulnerabilities, and risks unique to this domain.

title: Plan for Deployment and Operations
description: Develop a comprehensive plan for the deployment strategy, infrastructure requirements, monitoring, and maintenance processes for the TravelConcierge application. This plan should address scalability, reliability, security, cost-effectiveness, and seamless integration with the overall system architecture. Collaborate with relevant teams to ensure the plan is realistic and achievable within project timelines.

title: Review and Approve System Design
description: Review and approve the system design, including architecture, user interface, data management, security, and deployment plans.
